data.title: Issue
data.text: Upon replacing the HDD on my server error 1296 & 1314 popped up. The ? also appeared next to the disk in proxmox gui indicating unknown. When I tried to remove it on Datacenter > my-server > Disks > Directory > Destroy the failed to remove an error message appeared making me unable to remove it.

data.title: Solution
data.text: I navigated to Datacenter > Storage > {ID} > Remove to remove it. The error then stopped.
